name: StructureModifiers.RemoveSpawnsStructureModifier
description: Stock structure modifier that removes mob spawns from a structure. Does not remove the override list itself; see StructureModifiers.ClearSpawnsStructureModifier to remove override lists completely. Has the following json format: { "type": "neoforge:remove_spawns", // Required "structures": "#namespace:structure_tag", // Accepts a structure id, [list of structure ids], or #namespace:structure_tag "entity_types": #namespace:entitytype_tag // Accepts an entity type, [list of entity types], or #namespace:entitytype_tag }

fields.name: structures
fields.description: The field for the structures record component.

fields.name: entityTypes
fields.description: The field for the entityTypes record component.

constructors.name: RemoveSpawnsStructureModifier
constructors.description: Creates an instance of a RemoveSpawnsStructureModifier record class.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of this record class. The representation contains the name of the class, followed by the name and value of each of the record components.

methods.name: hashCode
methods.description: Returns a hash code value for this object. The value is derived from the hash code of each of the record components.

methods.name: equals
methods.description: Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this one. The objects are equal if the other object is of the same class and if all the record components are equal. All components in this record class are compared with Objects::equals(Object,Object) .

methods.name: structures
methods.description: Returns the value of the structures record component.

methods.name: entityTypes
methods.description: Returns the value of the entityTypes record component.
